post.body:
I created a mirror of FindingAssange.com that I will update to reflect the content of the original site at the end of the countdown.

1HLQpYAoaoZRoAH9JHHXXWSsBSLHBLaU4w 

I removed the getclicky external tracking.

Suggestions welcomed

comment.body: @Th3B3st @Firebox: I'll keep it up. I see 5 peers atm.
@Th3B3st: Thanks for confirming it works. Keep distributing it if you can, please. I'm not sure if findingassange.com is legit, but if it is, it has the potential to be big.
